description:
The vlan field in the networks table should be made unique. 
This will prevent from having distinct projects using the same vlan id when using the VLAN network manager. 

Once the vlan field is made unique, if there is already another network with the same vlan id the db update operation will fail. This way, nova-manage can return an error code if network_ref is None
title: Prevent duplicated VLAN IDs
